entry.title: Resume
entry.content: #EDUCATION BACKGROUND ##Nanjing University Nanjing, China Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Technology Minor in Business Administration GPA 4.512/5.0; Ranking 10/177 ##University of California, Berkeley Berkeley, California Exchange Student, Computer Science February 2020 - June 2020 GPA XXX/4.0 Conducted research on XXX #PUBLICATIONS AND PATENTSXXX In this paper, we discuss XXX and conclused XXX.#PROJECTS AND EXPERIENCE##National Undergraduate Innovation and Entrepreneurship Training Program 2018-2019 Detection and Classification of Acoustic Scenes and Events based on Deep Learning##Summer Research, NLP Summer Camp in Nanjing University July 2019-August 2019 Conducted research on Natural language processing##Summer Research, University of California, Los Angeles July 2020-August 2020 The Cross-disciplinary Scholars in Science and Technology Program#SELECTED HONORS##Awarded Heren scholarship in 2018(less than 30 students in Nanjing University)##Awarded Shanyuan International Exchange Scholarship in 2018 (less than 30 students in Najing University)#LEADERSHIP##Vice Minister of Practice Department in Tencent Club September 2018—September 2019 Responsible for leading team to organize daily meetings and exchange activities Responsible for allocating resources to new entrants to clubs Responsible for the publicity and arrangement of related competitions##Team leader for a national project in National Undergraduate Innovation and Entrepreneurship Training Program October 2018-October 2019 Responsible for communication between mentors and team members Responsible for the arrangement and supervision of team members’tasks Responsible for the guide to report progress on time##Summer Camp, Entrepreneurial Leadership and Team Building program in Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. July 2019#SKILLS##Proficiency in programming languages at all levels Using ASM or MIPS to realize simple operating system Skilled in C Language to Complete Various Tasks##Master Machine Learning Framework Caffe, Keras, TensorFlow Using python to implement various machine learning tasks Writing daily practical scripts

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
